name: luxestate-real-estate
description: A modern real estate application with React frontend and .NET Core backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: cd frontend/real-estate-web && npm run clean && cd ../../backend/RealEstate.Api && dotnet clean
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend/real-estate-web && npm run build && git subtree push --prefix=frontend/real-estate-web heroku main
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && git subtree push --prefix=backend heroku main

author: Luxestate Team
